name: 8-Bit Magic War
description:
The game is a 2D Shooter combined with Bullet Hell.

In the game menu you can choose the difficulty of the game: Easy, Medium, Hard, Ultra, Hell.

You play as a Sorcerer, you have the usual ability - to shoot balls of magic, there are 3 types: Fiery, Acid, Electric. There is also an additional ability, it can be used every 15 seconds and is marked on the left of the screen as Energy.

You must kill 3 types of different Little monsters, as well as 3 types of Bosses that appear every 10 waves.

You can upgrade your character:

1) Health.
2) Regeneration.
3) Damage.
4) Speed of fire.
5) The speed of magic balls.
6) Speed of movement.

Control:

Use WASD or Arrows to move around.

To use the usual ability, click the left mouse button.

To use the additional ability, click the right mouse button.

ESC to open munu bubble game.
